SEARCH
Package enquiry

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
enquiry.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents a user enquiry about a specific BTO project.

Captures sender, project referenced, message content, reply status, timestamps, and unique enquiry ID.

    • Enquiry
